<script>
(function() {
  function countItems() {
    function countInListing(listingId) {
      var container = document.getElementById(listingId);
      if (!container) {
        console.log('Container not found: ' + listingId);
        return 0;
      }
      
      console.log('Found container: ' + listingId, container);
      
      // æŸ¥æ‰¾ Quarto ç”Ÿæˆçš„åˆ—è¡¨é¡¹
      var items = container.querySelectorAll('.quarto-post, .list-item, .g-col-1');
      console.log('Items in ' + listingId + ':', items.length);
      
      if (items.length === 0) {
        // å°è¯•æŸ¥æ‰¾é“¾æ¥
        var links = container.querySelectorAll('a');
        var uniqueLinks = new Set();
        links.forEach(function(link) {
          var text = link.textContent.trim();
          if (text.length > 3 && link.href.includes('posts/novel')) {
            uniqueLinks.add(link.href);
          }
        });
        return uniqueLinks.size;
      }
      
      return items.length;
    }
    
    var worldviewCount = countInListing('worldview-listing');
    var charactersCount = countInListing('characters-listing');
    var keyplotsCount = countInListing('keyplots-listing');
    var chaptersCount = countInListing('chapters-listing');
    
    console.log('Novel counts:', worldviewCount, charactersCount, keyplotsCount, chaptersCount);
    
    var el1 = document.getElementById('worldview-count');
    var el2 = document.getElementById('characters-count');
    var el3 = document.getElementById('keyplots-count');
    var el4 = document.getElementById('chapters-count');
    
    if (el1) el1.textContent = worldviewCount;
    if (el2) el2.textContent = charactersCount;
    if (el3) el3.textContent = keyplotsCount;
    if (el4) el4.textContent = chaptersCount;
  }
  
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(countItems, 200);
    setTimeout(countItems, 800);
  } else {
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
      setTimeout(countItems, 200);
      setTimeout(countItems, 800);
    });
  }
})();
</script>
